## PermanentStorage.set() method

Sets value that will be stored with 'name' in permanent storage until expiration date

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
set(name: string, value: any, expires: moment.Moment): any;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | <code>string</code> | Name with which will be value stored |
|  value | <code>any</code> | Value to be stored |
|  expires | <code>moment.Moment</code> | Time when value should expire |

<b>Returns:</b>

`any`
